comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13719?focusedCommentId=17406635) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
What's your idea at the moment about what kind of content to put in this cookbook recipe? 
(I am wondering if this is not something that rather belongs in the main docs / it's also a rather vague title for a cookbook recipe, which I think ideally are concrete how to do actions)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13719?focusedCommentId=17422648) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
`[~thisisnic]` If I remember correctly this is one of the recipes you proposed, do you remember what you had in mind in terms of examples to showcase?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13719?focusedCommentId=17422669) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Can't entirely remember, but I think that from the R point-of-view I might have been thinking of something to do with the differences in data types between R and C++ and casting from one to another.  It might be covered by the schemas recipes though.  Feel free to drop it if there aren't any obvious useful recipes that come to mind here that aren't covered elsewhere though!
